name: Grave Robber Yoyo
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2  

The theme was REWIND.  

WASD or arrow keys to move

 Spacebar to rewind

Q key to toggle checkpoint on shovel

---- Hints ----

Yoyo can only grab gifts when its on the ground

Rewind collision can break stone

Collect strings to increase the Yoyo distance
